title: Spicy Tomato Chutney
ingredients: ['1.8kg (4 lb) ripe tomatoes', '1 (2cm) piece fresh root ginger', '3 cloves garlic', '350g (12 oz) caster sugar', '250ml (8 fl oz) red wine vinegar', '2 onions, diced', '4 tablespoons sultanas', '1 dessertspoon mixed spice', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 pinch paprika', '1 tablespoon Madras curry paste']
